title: Binance Slashes Staff But Says Reports of Thousands Being Cut Are 'Way Off'
description: Rumors swirled earlier in the year that the controversial digital asset behemoth would drastically reduce its headcount.

title: Synthetix founder launches Infinex to compete with centralized exchanges
description:
Infinex, a Synthetix frontend designed to rival centralized exchanges, was announced by its founder Kain Warwick on July 14. Infinex serves as a frontend to the existing derivatives liquidity protocol Synthetix, which operates in part on Optimism’s OP Mainnet. The new Infinex interface is intended to tackle three key obstacles: migrating users to Optimism, acquiring […]

The post Synthetix founder launches Infinex to compete with centralized exchanges appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: US Representative Ritchie Torres Calls for Investigation of SEC Over Prometheumâ€™s License
description: U.S. Rep. Ritchie Torres has called for an investigation into the special purpose broker-dealer (SPBD) license given by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to Prometheum, a cryptocurrency exchange platform. In two letters sent to U.S. Comptroller General Gene Dodaro and SEC Inspector General Deborah Jeffries, Torres calls for investigation of the “backroom deals” […]

title: Geist Finance shuts down forever following significant losses from Multichain exploit
description: Geist Finance, a lending protocol operating on the Fantom network, has announced its permanent shutdown following significant losses resulting from the Multichain exploit. In a social media post on July 14, the Geist development team confirmed that lending and borrowing activities would not be reopened. The protocol’s contracts were initially paused on July 6, followed ... Read more
